{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:{gid}_{id}_memory.used.gauge,
    alias:Used,
    interval:1m,

target.2 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:{gid}_{id}_memory.cached.gauge,
    alias:Cached,
    interval:1m,

target.3 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:{gid}_{id}_memory.free.gauge,
    alias:Free,
    interval:1m,

cfg.title = Memory
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 3
cfg.y_format = mbytes

}}
